__e: I don't wanna spend one extra second in this urban death maze.
I believe that a man lost in the mazes of his mind may imagine that he's anything.

And one day our friendship will break and that'll just prove your theory that relationships are conditional and you don't need human connection or deserve it, or whatever goes on in that rat-maze of your brain.
Christ, you're just as dense as your partner... trying to figure out the maze and running into walls.
